EmailTemplate.subject: A Pivotal Thanks!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thanks for visiting us in New York! An impressive speaker lineup, combined with leading technology vendors, and a multitude of data-driven attendees, made GigaOM Structure Data a top-notch industry event.
Pivotal CEO, Paul Maritz and GigaOM’s Om Malik discussed why a new type of data needs a new type of platform. "We are going to build a new platform, and the legacy has to cleave to that, not the other way around” stated Maritz.Visit the Pivotal P.O.V. Blog <http://blog.gopivotal.com/p-o-v/paul-maritz-at-structure-hadoop-is-just-one-ingredient-of-a-profound-shift-in-software> to read more about Paul Maritz at Structure Data <http://blog.gopivotal.com/p-o-v/paul-maritz-at-structure-hadoop-is-just-one-ingredient-of-a-profound-shift-in-software>.
Also, in New York -
Building on its innovative architecture for Business Data Lakes <http://www.gopivotal.com/big-data/businessdatalake>, Pivotal announced Pivotal HD 2.0 <http://www.gopivotal.com/big-data/pivotal-hd>, our enterprise distribution of the Apache Hadoop stack, now based on Apache Hadoop 2.2. To learn more about how Pivotal HD 2.0 helps enterprises get more out of Hadoop click here <http://blog.gopivotal.com/products/pivotal-hd-2-0-to-help-enterprises-to-get-more-out-of-hadoop-with-a-business-data-lake>.
If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us <http://www.gopivotal.com/contact>.
Missed us in New York? Pivotal will be at Structure San Francisco <http://events.gigaom.com/structure-2014/>, on June 18th to 19th.
Thanks, The Pivotal Team
